import{ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_ITEM,SUB_QUANTITY,ADD_QUANTITY,ADD_SHIPPING}from'./action-types/cart-actions';//add cart action
export var addToCart=function addToCart(id){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,id:id};};//remove item action
export var removeItem=function removeItem(id){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,id:id};};//subtract qt action
export var subtractQuantity=function subtractQuantity(id){return{type:SUB_QUANTITY,id:id};};//add qt action
export var addQuantity=function addQuantity(id){return{type:ADD_QUANTITY,id:id};};
